mapper.select: select notice_num, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, admin_id from notices order by notice_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into notices(notice_num, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, admin_id) values (notice_num_seq.nextval, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, to_date(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{adminId})
